page.title: 12A day in the life of Mr Iles
page.content: Mr Iles lives in Hilmarton but works for the government,often overseas.When he is in Indonesia he gets up at 06.15 and has breakfast of coffee,toast and jam.Then at 07.15 he goes to the office in a jeep.Here he starts to discuss the days programme with other members of the team.Then he makes sure everthing is set up for the day and sits down to write a report explaining how the organisatian he is working for buys rice from Indonesian farmers.In the report it suggests how the rice should be transported and stored for future use.He has his lunch at about 12 o clock.In the afternoon he works on the computer.He types in information about transporting grain. He then calculates the cheapest way of moving the grain around Indonesia.He goes back to the hotel at 17.00 and in the evening has another meeting.
